channel.title: 562 Problems (URGENT)
channel.description: Hey, I can run a server constantly for around 7 hours, however if i close the server and reopen it i need 2 reboot my computer before i can connect, my the connection shows up on the server but then the client just crashes/does not continue past the connection, However if i keep rebooting the server and client it does eventually connect. Any help? :confused: :confused:

item.title: 562 Problems (URGENT)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_GeOrGe_xI Ix GeOrGe xI
item.description:
@Ix_GeOrGe_xI wrote:

Hey, I can run a server constantly for around 7 hours, however if i close the server and reopen it i need 2 reboot my computer before i can connect, my the connection shows up on the server but then the client just crashes/does not continue past the connection, However if i keep rebooting the server and client it does eventually connect. Any help?
